General.Name: Hexing Electrical Co Ltd
General.Description: Hexing Electrical Co., Ltd. provides electrical equipment and related solutions to power utilities worldwide. It offers string inverters; IEC and ANSI meters; communication modules; fault circuit indicators and DCU products; recloser and pole switches; ring main units; RMU enclosures; and cable junction boxes. The company also offers a range of solutions, such as advance metering infrastructure; ATC&C/boundary metering; CIS/billing; integrated distribution management system; transformer monitoring system; vending system; SCADA system; substation automation system; and prefabricated substation. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Hexing Electrical Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Hexing Group Inc.
